parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: InputParameters
parameters.description: The settings of the input parameters for the rule.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: This parameter is scheduled to be removed before 00:00:00, June 30, 2021. Account group-related APIs will be provided as an alternative before 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related APIs after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. For more information, see [Account groups](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: MultiAccount
parameters.description: This parameter is scheduled to be removed before 00:00:00, June 30, 2021. Account group-related APIs will be provided as an alternative before 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related APIs after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. For more information, see [Account groups](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: RiskLevel
parameters.description:
The risk level of the non-compliant resource. Valid values:

*   1: high risk
*   2: medium risk
*   3: low risk

parameters.name: ScopeComplianceResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource to be evaluated.

*   If you do not set this parameter, the rule evaluates resources of all the types specified by ScopeComplianceResourceTypes.
*   If you specify a resource ID, the rule evaluates the resource identified by the ID.

parameters.name: ScopeComplianceResourceTypes
parameters.description: The types of the resources to be evaluated.

parameters.name: SourceDetailMessageType
parameters.description:
The trigger type of the rule. Valid values:

*   ConfigurationItemChangeNotification: The rule is triggered by configuration changes.
*   ScheduledNotification: The rule is triggered as scheduled.

parameters.name: SourceIdentifier
parameters.description:
The identifier of the rule.

*   For a managed rule, the value is the name of the managed rule.
*   For a custom rule, the value is the Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the custom rule.

parameters.name: SourceMaximumExecutionFrequency
parameters.description:
The frequency at which the rule is executed. Valid values:

*   One_Hour: 1 hour
*   Three_Hours: 3 hours
*   Six_Hours: 6 hours
*   Twelve_Hours: 12 hours
*   TwentyFour_Hours: 24 hours

parameters.name: SourceOwner
parameters.description:
Indicates whether you or Alibaba Cloud owns and manages the rule. Valid values:

*   CUSTOM_FC: The rule is a custom rule that you own.
*   ALIYUN: The rule is a managed rule of Alibaba Cloud.
